abstract: A chance for some girly pampering and an extra measure of security.
snippet: A chance for some girly pampering and an extra measure of security.
lead_paragraph: For women, traveling alone can be challenging. But some hotels, like the ITC group of luxury hotels in India (the ITC Gardenia in Bengaluru is shown at right), are helping to make it more appealing by offering floors exclusively for female guests.

headline.main: At Some Indian Hotels, Floors for Women Only
